website_summaries.verdict: This cordless blower has a brushless motor for longer runtime and more power.
pros: Concentrator speed nozzle increases air blast up to 150 mph
Battery rated for up to 60 minutes run time on low from a full charge
Variable speed trigger settings include speed lock and turbo boost
Accessory attachment collar fits Toro Gutter Cleaning Kit & Oscillating Nozzle Kit
cons: Nozzle assembly can be a bit awkward

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: This thing really moves some air, but there are problems. The variable speed trigger with lock lever is not a great design. The speed is hard to control easily and the lock sometime slips. (Mine didn't hold a speed at all until I tightened the screw.) The battery is rated to last "up to" sixty minutes, but I think 20-30 is closer to the truth.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but ...
customer_reviews.text: This cordless blower is pretty good. It has variable power and will move wet leaves at full throttle. It’s quiet and light weight. The battery does not last long, however. This product would be worthy of five stars if Toro had another battery that lasted longer on a charge or provided two batteries so that one could use and charge at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Very Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power. Pushed maple leaves into piles for the leaf mulching machine instead of having to rake. Even pushed wet leaves. Takes some getting used to if rounding up scattered leaves, like herding cats across Texas, but loves leaves one or two feet deep. Only lasts about 15 minutes on a charge but gets a lot done in that time. The gutter cleaning attachment was very awkward to use but got the job done. Luckily I have gutters fairly close to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! The battery charges quickly
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! The battery charges quickly, in about 20/30 minutes. The air flow is powerful enough to quickly move dry leaves. Wet leaves not so much, and drains the battery quickly. It’s not as heavy as a blower with a gas motor, so it doesn’t wear your arm out as you use it. Comes with different attachments. Would definitely buy again, much easier than using a broom
customer_reviews.author: Angela C. Newsom

customer_reviews.title: Fine Product
customer_reviews.text: Loved this - does a great job of blowing the leaves out of my gardens and holds its charge.
customer_reviews.author: lfherk

customer_reviews.title: Trade Off. Power for Convenience.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my plug in toro blower this one is weak. It is nice to blow grass off the walk and landscaping because it doesn’t blow the rocks everywhere. It is also nice to grab and go without worrying about gas or power cords. However, I had a load of landscape rock delivered and needed it to blow the leftover rubble off the drive and it could barely handle the job. For any big jobs I still get out the old corded model. I can blow off the sidewalk, drive, and rocks twice before recharging; so I charge every other mow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: blows well
customer_reviews.text: We try to find a brand we like, so we can interchange the battery and charger. For us. Toro has been an excellent brand, and the leaf blower lives up to the high expectations we have when purchasing a toro product. We have a huge oak tree eating our front lawn and street. When we moved here we had more leaves than grass. This leaf blower really works to get the leaves in one space, and while loud, isn't as loud as ones we've heard other people using. The variable speed is great, we can get huge patches or do more refined areas around steps and in between plants.
customer_reviews.author: Becky at the beach

customer_reviews.title: OMG! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I ignored all of the bad reviews on this thing, and ordered it anyway, thinking they were pretty harsh... The reviews are TRUE! The battery lasted only six weeks. I was going to order a new battery only to discover that the batteries are literally 3X as much as the blower. READ THE REVIEWS! Service from the seller was good.
customer_reviews.author: Loco18

customer_reviews.title: Powerful! Extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.text: One of the features I really like about this blower is the blower tube has three extensions for general cleaning, blowing leaves and cleaning stuck on debris and they fit INSIDE of each other. No clips to break or stiff plastic latches that never work right. The trigger speed control provides any amount from a gentle whisper all the way to a powerful blast of air. I highly recommend this and the  as a great cordless set for your yard.
customer_reviews.author: ToolBoxHero

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste you money on this junk!
customer_reviews.text: This product has already stopped working. I've had it for 5 months with very minimal use. It's been stored indoors. The manufacturer warranty is a joke. Really tried of buying products from companies that out source jobs to China and sell me expense junk that stops working after a couple of uses. $170 of my hard earned money wasted on a product your companies won't replace.
customer_reviews.author: deneene

customer_reviews.title: One Time Use
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until the battery needed to be recharged and now it won’t charge again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bonowski

customer_reviews.title: poor battery performance
customer_reviews.text: This leaf blower was expensive but we were willing to pay the price for the convenience of a recharagable tool. However, after only a few uses the battery will not recharge and therefore we now have a 200.00 item that we cannot use. I would have returned it but the return period was short, and we bought it as a Xmas gift and didnt even begin using it until spring. Disappointed!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Vanvorst

customer_reviews.title: strong blower, but battery life isn't very good
customer_reviews.text: We have found that on average, we only get about 10-15 mins of battery life (not the 60 mins Toro claims). That being said, while it is running, it is a very powerful and capable blower. two features I like are the extended handle to make it easy to hold with two hands, and the trigger lock so you don't have to constantly be pulling the trigger.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Cashion

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed for a brand-new item no quality control with this ...
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this product as the charger does not charge the battery . Very disappointed for a brand-new item no quality control with this company! I would like my money back for this item thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerJoan Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it - I was reluctant at first being electric
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it - I was reluctant at first being electric, but this thing truly blows! For the true power you need to use turbo mode, but the battery dies quite quickly, I'm happy with buying the bigger battery pack for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: A Monstrosity
customer_reviews.text: Toro model 51702T (24 v) gave me great service for more than ten years, especially with a second battery. Now it has died and replacing it has been a challenge. I tried Black & Decker LSW36 but it has little power. This Toro 51690 has good power but is otherwise a monstrosity. It's big, heavy and loud, and the battery didn't last very long. The controls are awkward. Without the battery installed, it tips over easily. If this is the current state of cordless technology we have a long way to go.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as the numbers indicate.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised a lot of power. I actually move more with my little Black and Decker. It is a bit heavy. The battery goes an hour they say. The work I have to do is fairly light. I clean off the front walks and approach to our building every morning. Should take 15 minutes. To do it in 15 minutes I need the max velocity, without the boost, to get it done. The battery barely makes it to the end. Many morning I go back and get the little guy to finish the work.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Anaforian

customer_reviews.title: This blower is great for home use
customer_reviews.text: This blower is great for home use. The battery holds a charge very well and it recharges very quickly (about 30 minutes). The charge indicator lights on the battery allows you to know how much battery you have left. The Turbo lever gives you the ability to blow heavier lawn debris. It is so nice to use a clean energy product without having to use a gas/oil mixture!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: terrible product
customer_reviews.text: this blower has never worked properly. it is garbage. waited too long to return it and that's my fault. even took it to a repair shop and they laughed and said was garbage and could not be fixed. was told the battery works fine, which it does, but that the switch and safety button poorly made and half the time, no power gets to the motor. so for a cheap switch and poor design, I have a ten pound paperweight. buy any other brand but Toro.
customer_reviews.author: richard j. yrulegui

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I already had the Toro PowerPlex battery and charger so just getting the leaf blower was awesome. On high power it's awesome, it just doesn't last as long, which makes sense...because it's battery powered...but it's a great tool and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: It's a leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: I got this hoping to blow leaves out of my gutter...not powerful enough for that. Does well on leaves on the ground
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Wills

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is not as good when used with the blower and it is when used with the Toto weed whacker that I have, but I realize that the blower runs at a higher speed. So far I am completely satisfied and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Works great, first time using it blew off the property ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandfather, he was tired of trying to get the gas powered blower started. Works great, first time using it blew off the property for 30 min and it was just as strong as when it started. Does just as good as the old husky 125 gas powered.
customer_reviews.author: McDaniel A Shuford

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worthless. Used 3 times. Battery charger and battery then dies. Stay away
customer_reviews.author: JAA

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blower
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Charges fairly quick. Good to clean off most surfaces very well yet not that great for lawn leaves. No comparison to a gas leaf blower for the lawn. Light weight and can be hung on a wall. Not sure how long full charge will last.
customer_reviews.author: matthew josephhager

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t come with a battery or a charger.
customer_reviews.text: Shame on me for missing this fact. I borrowed one of these recently and fell in love with it for small jobs. And for $119 it was a great deal. It turns out the charger and battery more than double the price.
customer_reviews.author: MG Davis

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The reviews about the battery are true. Battery lasted only two uses and won’t charge any more....do not buy this blower it’s a waste of money. The window has closed to send back to Amazon. If their was a negative star rating I would rate it as such.
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and relatively quiet.  No gas hassles.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Quiet and light weight when compared to gas-powered blowers, and a battery charge is enough to last for two or three weekly mowing cycles for our yard. No hassles with gasoline or a cord. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Texas2Step

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good machine. However the battery is rather heavy oveŕ a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: LEROY MCNEARY

customer_reviews.title: Toro Power Plex Blower
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one year from date bought and then battery charger quit working. Now can't get any satisfaction for help with it other than returning to Amazon minus 20% less on cost due to not returning November 2018. Will not be ordering anything such as this from Amazon again. Beware!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Owen

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this brushless blower! It is easy to handle; no fussing with either gasoline or power cords and easily does what is needed without having to stop and charge. It has made it almost fun to blow my leaves into piles so I can either use the vacuum or just scoop the leaves as is into the debris box. I cannot recommend this highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: Love my new leaf blower. Light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Secret Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the blower, has plenty of power and love not tripping over a cord.
customer_reviews.author: E. Yost

customer_reviews.title: plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: lots of power not a barbie blower. battery charges quickly and lasts about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: bender101

customer_reviews.title: This item Blows!  Just like it's supposed too!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my dad and he said he loves it. Well see if it lasts but I think it will. Good name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R.

customer_reviews.title: Best leaf blower I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best leaf blower I have ever owned, light weight, good handle balance and button control and for a hand held extremely powerful. Love It,
customer_reviews.author: Johnny P

customer_reviews.title: very powerful
customer_reviews.text: I "raked" all my leaves with the blower saving my shoulders and arms. I also purchase the gutter accessory and it worked great, no more ladder climbing. Now we have had a couple of 1" snowfalls and I used it to clear the driveway, sidewalk and patio. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: bob cowan

customer_reviews.title: better than most alternatives
customer_reviews.text: Only about 2⁄3 as powerful as my old corded Toro leaf blower, but adequate for an average sized (1 acre) property like mine. It beats the hell out of a gas powered unit with it's maintenance problems or dragging a 100" cord around from out let to outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Nick R.

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and no power
customer_reviews.text: It isn't very powerful. And it's bulky. We had a much smaller and lighter ( same brand which is good) one that was much more efficient and didn't take up much room. Not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 14

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived non-working
customer_reviews.text: Item came with non functioning battery/charger. Contacted Toro and their policy is that the buyer must pay for shipping. Explained that item came new and not working and they’re response was, sorry, that’s the policy! I won’t buy toro again.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Griffanti

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves this blower. Charges quickly and has a lot of power. Very happy with this purchase. Some may not think the battery lasts long enough, but it is great for what we need it for.
customer_reviews.author: mgmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice blower
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of blowing power and battery lasts about 20 mins even after having it for about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After comparing all others, I chose this as it offered exactly what I was looking for in a blower.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Storti

customer_reviews.title: Recieved with BAD battery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this blower on Amazon five months ago and received it with a bad battery. I am unable to use it for more than 3min without it shutting off. Now, I am having to replace the battery which is $100+!!! Do not wast your money
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Not that good.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, only used to blow leaves off driveway light duty. Motor crapped out, now in landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Welch

customer_reviews.title: Another great Toro product
customer_reviews.text: I like the light weight and it has enough power
customer_reviews.author: TJL

customer_reviews.title: So we liked the fact that we didn’t need to fight with ...
customer_reviews.text: So we liked the fact that we didn’t need to fight with multiple extension cords while blowing leaves and debris in our yard. We also liked not having to mess with gasoline. What we didn’t like is that the charge lasted bout 20 minuets maximum
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle verick

customer_reviews.title: It's the right size for the job I do today.
customer_reviews.text: I have very little need for a blower so this small, battery powered is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Poofie the Clown

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's okay you would really like a little more power.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.Powers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for short small jobs whether blowing light snow or grass and leaves. About an hour run time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POOR BATTERY
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the battery doesn't hold a charge for more than 15 to 25 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Its lightweight but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very power full battery life is ok but wish had an extra but it's good an power full
customer_reviews.author: marcos

customer_reviews.title: Great  Blower  more  than  pleased with  it TORO hit  a  home  run  with  this.
customer_reviews.text: Great Blower it has done everything I hoped it would from cleaning out my gutters to blowing off my driveway and walkway love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Crumbley

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: POS. Louder than loud. Might as well get a broom.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: new out of the box will only lite up the red right side lite?
customer_reviews.text: battery will not go into a "charging" mode as new out of the box? HELP or REPLACE?
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: didnt last
customer_reviews.text: battery died after about a year and a half, new battery is $100. too expensive, probably need to go back to gas
customer_reviews.author: Tara Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life allows me to get the job done before a recharge
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Only worked three times. Battery will not recharge. Went out and purchased a gas blower.
customer_reviews.author: ME Cole

customer_reviews.title: Worst Leaf Blower Ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought less than a year ago and use it lightly. Almost burned my house down had I not caught it in time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO LEARN TO NAVIGATE
customer_reviews.text: LIKE IT VERY MUCH. AS A SENIOR MAKES WORK EASIER
customer_reviews.author: GLYNNIE LASLOVICH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and they were very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Jean Ruckman

customer_reviews.title: Easy for women to operate
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Easy for women to operate. Battery life shirt
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for SMALL yards or for adhoc blowing in localised area.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good blower and produces a good level of airflow when you push the max button but the battery is terrible. I got the 'upgraded' battery and i have to be selective on where i hit the MAX air button if I want to finish my backyard. Theres no way it will do the front of my yard but this is would be a good choice for those that have houses on a smaller (half acre or less) plot of land.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetFreak

product_meta.title: Toro PowerPlex 51690T Brushless 40V MAX 480 CFM 150 MPH Cordless Blower, without Battery & Charger
product_meta.description: Style:Cordless Blower (51690T)Blow away yard debris with Toro's PowerPlex BLDC Blower. This cordless, 40V Max blower has the power to move debris and the features needed to easily control it for many different tasks. Its thoughtful design puts the variable speed trigger, speed lock, turbo boost close together for one-handed operation on a very well-balanced tool. To expand the utility and save its customers time, Toro included blower components that allow for the easy attachment of the Toro gutter cleaning kit and a path-widening, oscillating nozzle kit. With 90 watt-hours, the T90 battery provides up to 60 minutes of run time and this battery charges in approximately 60 minutes in the quick charger. Battery and charger not included. No other cordless blower offers this combination of versatility and power. Take charge with Toro PowerPlex tools.
feature_bullets: Turbo boost power with speed lock up to 480 CFM to move more faster - 20% more air volume (CFM) than its highest performing direct competitor
Speed nozzle increases air speed to 150 mph
Brushless DC motor for more power, more run time and longer life than brushed motor
Control speed with the variable speed trigger: Lower Speed = Longest Runtime (up to 60 minutes); Higher Speed = More Power; Turbo Speed = More Power, Less Runtime (up to 10 minutes runtime)

Not included, Sold Separately: T90 Battery 88540 (40V max, 2.5 amp-hour, 90 watt-hour) and quick charger 88542 (60-minute charge time). T90 Battery provides up to 60 minutes run time (on low speed) from a full charge.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars118 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
